name: Notion Beginner Bundle
description: Notion Beginner Bundle is a bundle of 7 starter templates for Notion designed to help anyone get started building their own workspace.Duplicate the bundle and pick & choose which templates to use for your next workspace in only a few clicks.Guaranteed beginner-friendly, easy-to-use, simple and minimalistic template designs.Here's what's inside...Goal Action PlanGoal Action Plan Template for Notion is a place to visualize what happens after accomplishing your goals as well as how to accomplis
features: Can I share this with anyone else?No. This product has a private license. If you wish to share the bundle with someone, please direct them to this page.; Can I be your affiliate?Sure thing! You can sign up as an affiliatehere.
